device-usage.summary: The USBDevice interface of the the WebUSB API provides access to metadata about a paired USB device and methods for controlling it.
device-usage.title: USBDevice

dom-usb-getdevices.summary: The getDevices method of the USB interface returns a Promise that resolves with an array of USBDevice objects for paired attached devices. For information on pairing devices, see USB.requestDevice().
dom-usb-getdevices.title: USB.getDevices()

dom-usb-onconnect.summary: The onconnect property of the USB interface is an event handler called whenever a paired device is connected.
dom-usb-onconnect.title: USB.onconnect

dom-usb-ondisconnect.summary: The ondisconnect property of the USB is an event handler called whenever a paired device is disconnected.
dom-usb-ondisconnect.title: USB.ondisconnect

dom-usb-requestdevice-options-options.summary: The requestDevice() method of the USB interface returns a Promise that resolves with an instance of USBDevice if the specified device is found. Calling this function triggers the user agent's pairing flow.
dom-usb-requestdevice-options-options.title: USB.requestDevice()

dom-usbdevice-claiminterface.summary: The claimInterface() method of the USBDevice interface returns a promise that resolves when the requested interface is claimed for exclusive access.
dom-usbdevice-claiminterface.title: USBDevice.claimInterface()

dom-usbdevice-clearhalt.summary: The clearHalt() method of the USBDevice interface returns a promise that resolves when a halt condition is cleared. A halt condition is when a data tranfer to or from the device has a status of 'stall', which requires the web page (the host system, in USB terminology) to clear that condition. See the for details.
dom-usbdevice-clearhalt.title: USBDevice.clearHalt()

dom-usbdevice-close.summary: The close() method of the USBDevice interface returns a promise that resolves when all open interfaces are released and the device session has ended.
dom-usbdevice-close.title: USBDevice.close()

dom-usbdevice-configuration.summary: The configuration read only property of the USBDevice interface returns a USBConfiguration object for the currently selected interface for a paired USB device.
dom-usbdevice-configuration.title: USBDevice.configuration

dom-usbdevice-configurations.summary: The configurations read only property of the USBDevice interface an array of device-specific interfaces for controlling a paired USB device.
dom-usbdevice-configurations.title: USBDevice.configurations

dom-usbdevice-controltransferin.summary: The controlTransferIn() method of the USBDevice interface returns a promise that resolves with a USBInTransferResult when a command or status operation has been transmitted to the USB device.
dom-usbdevice-controltransferin.title: USBDevice.controlTransferIn()

dom-usbdevice-controltransferout.summary: The controlTransferOut() method of the USBDevice interface returns a promise that resolves with a USBOutTransferResult when a command or status operation has been transmitted from the USB device.
dom-usbdevice-controltransferout.title: USBDevice.controlTransferOut()

dom-usbdevice-deviceclass.summary: The deviceClass read only property of the USBDevice interface one of three properties that identify USB devices for the purpose of loading a USB driver that will work with that device. The other two properties are USBDevice.deviceSubclass and USBDevice.deviceprotocol.
dom-usbdevice-deviceclass.title: USBDevice.deviceClass

dom-usbdevice-deviceprotocol.summary: The deviceProtocol read only property of the USBDevice interface one of three properties that identify USB devices for the purpose of loading a USB driver that will work with that device. The other two properties are USBDevice.deviceClass and USBDevice.deviceSubclass.
dom-usbdevice-deviceprotocol.title: USBDevice.deviceProtocol

dom-usbdevice-devicesubclass.summary: The deviceSubclass read only property of the USBDevice interface one of three properties that identify USB devices for the purpose of loading a USB driver that will work with that device. The other two properties are USBDevice.deviceClass and USBDevice.deviceProtocol.
dom-usbdevice-devicesubclass.title: USBDevice.deviceSubclass

dom-usbdevice-deviceversionmajor.summary: The deviceVersionMajor read only property of the USBDevice interface he major version number of the device in a semantic versioning scheme.
dom-usbdevice-deviceversionmajor.title: USBDevice.deviceVersionMajor

dom-usbdevice-deviceversionminor.summary: The deviceVersionMinor read only property of the USBDevice interface the minor version number of the device in a semantic versioning scheme.
dom-usbdevice-deviceversionminor.title: USBDevice.deviceVersionMinor

dom-usbdevice-deviceversionsubminor.summary: The deviceVersionSubminor read only property of the USBDevice interface the patch version number of the device in a semantic versioning scheme.
dom-usbdevice-deviceversionsubminor.title: USBDevice.deviceVersionSubminor

dom-usbdevice-isochronoustransferin.summary: The isochronousTransferIn() method of the USBDevice interface returns a promise that resolves with a USBIsochronousInTransferResult when time sensitive information has been transmitted to the USB device.
dom-usbdevice-isochronoustransferin.title: USBDevice.isochronousTransferIn()

dom-usbdevice-isochronoustransferout.summary: The isochronousTransferOut() method of the USBDevice interface returns a promise that resolves with a USBIsochronousOutTransferResult when time sensitive information has been transmitted from the USB device.
dom-usbdevice-isochronoustransferout.title: USBDevice.isochronousTransferOut()

dom-usbdevice-manufacturername.summary: The manufacturerName read only property of the USBDevice interface the of the organization that manufactured the USB device.
dom-usbdevice-manufacturername.title: USBDevice.manufacturerName

dom-usbdevice-open.summary: The open() method of the USBDevice interface returns a promise that resolves when a device session has started.
dom-usbdevice-open.title: USBDevice.open()

dom-usbdevice-opened.summary: The opened read only property of the USBDevice interface indicates whether a session has been started with a paired USB device. A device must be opened before it can conrolled by a web page.
dom-usbdevice-opened.title: USBDevice.opened

dom-usbdevice-productid.summary: The productID read only property of the USBDevice interface the manufacturer-defined code that identifies a USB device.
dom-usbdevice-productid.title: USBDevice.productID

dom-usbdevice-productname.summary: The productName read only property of the USBDevice interface the manufacturer-defined name that identifies a USB device.
dom-usbdevice-productname.title: USBDevice.productName

dom-usbdevice-releaseinterface.summary: The releaseInterface() method of the USBDevice interface returns a promise that resolves when a cliamed interface is released from exclusive access.
dom-usbdevice-releaseinterface.title: USBDevice.releaseInterface()

dom-usbdevice-reset.summary: The reset() method of the USBDevice interface eturns a promise that resolves when the device is reset and all app operations canceled and their promises rejected.
dom-usbdevice-reset.title: USBDevice.reset()

dom-usbdevice-selectalternateinterface.summary: The selectAlternateInterface() method of the USBDevice interface returns a promise that resolves when the specified alternative endpoint is selected.
dom-usbdevice-selectalternateinterface.title: USBDevice.selectAlternateInterface()

dom-usbdevice-selectconfiguration.summary: The selectConfiguration() method of the USBDevice interface returns a promise that resolves when the specified configuration is selected.
dom-usbdevice-selectconfiguration.title: USBDevice.selectConfiguration()

dom-usbdevice-serialnumber.summary: The serialNumber read only property of the USBDevice interface is the manufacturer-defined serial number for the specific USB device.
dom-usbdevice-serialnumber.title: USBDevice.serialNumber

dom-usbdevice-transferin.summary: The transferIn() method of the USBDevice interface returns a promise that resolves with a USBTransferInResult when bulk or interrupt data is transmitted to the USB device.
dom-usbdevice-transferin.title: USBDevice.transferIn()

dom-usbdevice-transferout.summary: The transferOut() method of the USBDevice interface returns a promise that resolves with a USBTransferOutResult when bulk or interrupt data is transmitted from the USB device.
dom-usbdevice-transferout.title: USBDevice.transferOut()

dom-usbdevice-usbversionmajor.summary: The usbVersionMajor read only property of the USBDevice interface is one of three properties that declare the USB protocol version supported by the device. The other two properties are USBDevice.usbVersionMinor and USBDevice.usbVersionSubminor.
dom-usbdevice-usbversionmajor.title: USBDevice.usbVersionMajor

dom-usbdevice-usbversionminor.summary: The usbVersionMinor read only property of the USBDevice interface is one of three properties that declare the USB protocol version supported by the device. The other two properties are USBDevice.usbVersionMajor and USBDevice.usbVersionSubminor.
dom-usbdevice-usbversionminor.title: USBDevice.usbVersionMinor

dom-usbdevice-usbversionsubminor.summary: The usbVersionSubminor read only property of the USBDevice interface is one of three properties that declare the USB protocol version supported by the device. The other two properties are USBDevice.usbVersionMajor and USBDevice.usbVersionMinor.
dom-usbdevice-usbversionsubminor.title: USBDevice.usbVersionSubminor

dom-usbdevice-vendorid.summary: The vendorID read only property of the USBDevice interface is the official usg.org-assigned vendor ID.
dom-usbdevice-vendorid.title: USBDevice.vendorID

enumeration.summary: The USB interface of the WebUSB API provides attributes and methods for finding and connecting USB devices from a web page.
enumeration.title: USB
